analyzed: mig rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: It is the pure eye.

original: shin tu yongs su gtong bar byed pa dang / shin tu 'dor bar byed pa dang / len pa med par byed pa dang / shin tu nges par spong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin la rtog pa 'di ni shes rab kyi mig ces bya'o //
analyzed: shin tu yongs su gtong bar byed pa dang / shin tu 'dor bar byed pa dang / len pa med par byed pa dang / shin tu nges par spong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin la rtog pa 'di ni shes rab kyi mig ces bya'o //
translated: It is the eye of wisdom that is the nature of giving away, letting go, relinquishing, and thoroughly giving up.

original: shes rab kyi mig ces bya ba ni zad pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par shes pa yin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi mig ces bya ba ni zad pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par shes pa yin te /
translated: The eye of wisdom is the knowledge of exhaustion, the knowledge of freedom from desire, the knowledge of cessation, the knowledge of nonarising, and the knowledge of non-conditioning.

original: 'di ni zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sa yin /
analyzed: 'di ni zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sa yin /
translated: This is the level of peace, complete peace, and utter peace.

original: 'di ni mtshams sbyor ba med pa dang / so sor mtshams sbyor ba nye bar gcod pa yin /
analyzed: 'di ni mtshams sbyor ba med pa dang / so sor mtshams sbyor ba nye bar gcod pa yin /
translated: This is the absence of connection and the severing of individual connections.

original: 'di ni gcod pa med cing nye bar gcod pa med par shes pa ma nyams pa yin /
analyzed: 'di ni gcod pa med cing nye bar gcod pa med par shes pa ma nyams pa yin /
translated: This is the knowledge of non-cutting and non-severance that is not impaired.

original: 'di ni ye shes 'chab pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni ye shes 'chab pa med pa yin no //
translated: This is the wisdom that is not concealed.

original: spros pa med pa'i sa 'di lta bu ni shes rab kyi mig yin te /
analyzed: spros pa med pa'i sa 'di lta bu ni shes rab kyi mig yin te /
translated: This is the eye of wisdom that is the level of the absence of conceptual elaboration.

original: shes rab kyi mig de dang ldan pa ni sems can rnams kyi spyod pa la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos @131b zin pa'i sems bskyed pa yang 'thob par 'gyur /
analyzed: shes rab kyi mig de dang ldan pa ni sems can rnams kyi spyod pa la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos @131b zin pa'i sems bskyed pa yang 'thob par 'gyur /
translated: Those who have the eye of wisdom will also attain the generation of the mind that is embraced by great love and great compassion for the conduct of sentient beings.

original: de sems can la dmigs pa'i sbyor bas yongs su gtugs te gnas par yang 'gyur /
analyzed: de sems can la dmigs pa'i sbyor bas yongs su gtugs te gnas par yang 'gyur /
translated: They will also reach the limit of abiding in the application that focuses on sentient beings.

original: chos thams cad sems can med pa dang / srog med par yang khong du chud par 'gyur te /
analyzed: chos thams cad sems can med pa dang / srog med par yang khong du chud par 'gyur te /
translated: They will also understand that all phenomena are devoid of sentient beings and devoid of life force.

original: de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: When they fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood,

original: gdon mi za bar chos kyi gter bla na med pa gzungs kyi sgo rnam par sbyong ba'i chos kyi le'u rim par phye ba 'di yang yang dag par bstan par bya zhing chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yang gtad par bya'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar chos kyi gter bla na med pa gzungs kyi sgo rnam par sbyong ba'i chos kyi le'u rim par phye ba 'di yang yang dag par bstan par bya zhing chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yang gtad par bya'o //
translated: they will undoubtedly reveal this unsurpassed Dharma treasure, this section of the Dharma that purifies the dhāraṇī gateway, and they will entrust this Dharma seal.

original: bkod pa mtha' yas /
analyzed: bkod pa mtha' yas /
translated: “Bhaiṣajyarāja,

original: gzungs kyi sgo'i chos rim par phye ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi tshul rgyun mi gcad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo'i chos rim par phye ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi tshul rgyun mi gcad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: This Dharma section of the dhāraṇī gateway is the intention of all buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa yin /
translated: It is upheld by all buddhas.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba yin; chos kyi sgo 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rnam par spyod cing rab tu ston te /
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba yin; chos kyi sgo 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rnam par spyod cing rab tu ston te /
translated: This Dharma gateway is practiced and taught by all buddhas.

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcun bzhugs pa thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo'i chos rim par phye ba 'di ston par mdzad do //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcun bzhugs pa thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo'i chos rim par phye ba 'di ston par mdzad do //
translated: All the blessed buddhas of the past, present, and future, who dwell in the ten directions, teach this Dharma section of the dhāraṇī gateway.

original: ston par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ston par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will teach it.

original: chos kyi sgo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi chos rab tu ston pa rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi sgo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi chos rab tu ston pa rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: This Dharma gateway purifies the bodhisattvas’ teaching of the sameness of the three times.

original: des na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dus gsum gyi chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug par @132a *//
analyzed: des na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dus gsum gyi chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug par @132a *//
translated: Therefore, they will engage with the phenomena of the three times—the past, the future, and the present—in a way that is in accordance with reality.

original: 'gyur ro // chos kyi sgo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum rnam par dag pa kun 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // chos kyi sgo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum rnam par dag pa kun 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: This Dharma gateway will enable bodhisattvas to uphold the purity of the three times.

original: de dag la dus kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'jug la /
analyzed: de dag la dus kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'jug la /
translated: They will not entertain any notions of time.

original: mi dge ba thams cad kyang 'joms par 'gyur /
analyzed: mi dge ba thams cad kyang 'joms par 'gyur /
translated: They will overcome all nonvirtue.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyang rjes su 'thob par 'gyur /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyang rjes su 'thob par 'gyur /
translated: They will attain various roots of virtue.

original: lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa la gnas par yang 'gyur /
analyzed: lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa la gnas par yang 'gyur /
translated: They will abide in the pure activity of body, speech, and mind.

original: ye shes rnam par dag pa kun du gzung ba'i phyir sgo tshad med pa yongs su sbyong bar yang 'gyur /
analyzed: ye shes rnam par dag pa kun du gzung ba'i phyir sgo tshad med pa yongs su sbyong bar yang 'gyur /
translated: In order to uphold the purity of wisdom, they will purify countless gateways.

original: chos kyi tshul dmigs su med par gyur pa la yang spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: chos kyi tshul dmigs su med par gyur pa la yang spyod par 'gyur /
translated: They will engage with the Dharma way, which is beyond reference points.

original: chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur yang brjod par 'gyur /
analyzed: chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur yang brjod par 'gyur /
translated: They will also say that all phenomena are like space.

original: shes rab rnam par dag pa kun tu bstan pa dang rab tu bstan pa'i phyir shes rab kyi snang ba chen po nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa yang ston par 'gyur /
analyzed: shes rab rnam par dag pa kun tu bstan pa dang rab tu bstan pa'i phyir shes rab kyi snang ba chen po nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa yang ston par 'gyur /
translated: In order to demonstrate and teach the purity of wisdom, they will reveal the great light of wisdom that pervades the reaches of space.

original: chos thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba dang / lam rnam par dag pas byang chub ji lta ba bzhin smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bden pa mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa la yang mkhas par 'gyur /
analyzed: chos thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba dang / lam rnam par dag pas byang chub ji lta ba bzhin smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bden pa mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa la yang mkhas par 'gyur /
translated: In order to realize that all phenomena are of the nature of space, to purify the path of omniscient wisdom, and to fulfill their aspirations in accordance with awakening through the purification of the path, they will become skilled in accomplishing the superknowledge of truth.

original: bden pa dbyer med pa bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bden pa dbyer med pa bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: In order to demonstrate the indivisibility of the truths, they will also reveal the wisdom of the buddhas.

original: bkod pa mtha' yas /
analyzed: bkod pa mtha' yas /
translated: “Anantavyūha,

original: don thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir chos 'di la slob pa'i byang chub @132b sems dpa' ni myur du byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs kyang rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir chos 'di la slob pa'i byang chub @132b sems dpa' ni myur du byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs kyang rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The bodhisattva who trains in this Dharma will quickly purify the accumulation of the factors of awakening in order to comprehend all meanings.

original: de byang chub las ring bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de byang chub las ring bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: He will not be far from awakening.

original: nye bar gnas par 'gyur yang chos 'ga' dang ring ba'am; chos bstan pa 'di dang nye bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: nye bar gnas par 'gyur yang chos 'ga' dang ring ba'am; chos bstan pa 'di dang nye bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He will be close to it, but he will not see any Dharma that is far or close to this teaching of the Dharma.

original: byang chub ni chos dang chos ma yin pa gang gis kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: byang chub ni chos dang chos ma yin pa gang gis kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Awakening is not seen by any Dharma that is virtuous or nonvirtuous.

original: byang chub rnam par rig pa bya ba ma yin par shes shing /
analyzed: byang chub rnam par rig pa bya ba ma yin par shes shing /
translated: Awakening is not an object of knowledge.

original: rnam par rig pa mnyam pa nyid dang / rnam par rig pa med par rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par rig pa mnyam pa nyid dang / rnam par rig pa med par rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is the realization of the sameness of cognition and the absence of cognition.

original: chos rnams la zhi ba'i don du rnam par lta ba ni byang chub tu rtog par yang mi byed de /
analyzed: chos rnams la zhi ba'i don du rnam par lta ba ni byang chub tu rtog par yang mi byed de /
translated: One who views phenomena as having the meaning of peace does not conceive of awakening.

original: zhi bas kyang zhi ba mi mthong la /
analyzed: zhi bas kyang zhi ba mi mthong la /
translated: The peaceful does not see the peaceful.

original: zhi ba la ma gtogs pas kyang zhi ba mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: zhi ba la ma gtogs pas kyang zhi ba mi mthong ngo //
translated: Nor does one who is not included in the peaceful see the peaceful.

original: cung zad kyang mi mthong yang thams cad du lta ba rnam par sbyong bar yang byed la /
analyzed: cung zad kyang mi mthong yang thams cad du lta ba rnam par sbyong bar yang byed la /
translated: Although one does not see anything at all, one also purifies all views.

original: cung zad kyang rnam par sbyong ba yang med do //
analyzed: cung zad kyang rnam par sbyong ba yang med do //
translated: And yet, one does not purify anything at all.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sgo yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sgo yin te /
translated: This is the gateway to the bodhisattvas’ pure wisdom.

original: sgo des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi gter mtha' yas pa yang rjes su dran par 'gyur /
analyzed: sgo des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi gter mtha' yas pa yang rjes su dran par 'gyur /
translated: Through this gateway, they will recall the infinite Dharma treasures of the thus-gone ones.

original: sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su shes par byas nas /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su shes par byas nas /
translated: Having understood the nature of sentient beings,

original: chos kyi gter 'di yang ston par 'gyur /
analyzed: chos kyi gter 'di yang ston par 'gyur /
translated: they will reveal this Dharma treasure.

original: shes rab dang ye shes kyi las yongs su dag pa yang rjes su dran par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab dang ye shes kyi las yongs su dag pa yang rjes su dran par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will also recall the pure activity of insight and wisdom.

original: de 'dod na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /🔽lhag pa'i @133a *//
analyzed: de 'dod na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /🔽lhag pa'i @133a *//
translated: If they wish, they will fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.

original: bsam pa'i smon lam la yang 'jug par 'gyur la /
analyzed: bsam pa'i smon lam la yang 'jug par 'gyur la /
translated: They will engage in the aspiration of intention

original: smon lam rnam par dag pa la mkhas pa yang rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing myur du chos thams cad la dbang thob nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po yang kun nas 'dzin zhing mngon du gyur par byed do //
analyzed: smon lam rnam par dag pa la mkhas pa yang rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing myur du chos thams cad la dbang thob nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po yang kun nas 'dzin zhing mngon du gyur par byed do //
translated: and will recall the pure aspiration of expertise. They will swiftly attain mastery over all phenomena and will uphold and actualize the great love and great compassion of the thus-gone ones.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod la mkhas pa; chos kyi snang ba tshad med cing mtha' med par ston par byed cing bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi yul la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod la mkhas pa; chos kyi snang ba tshad med cing mtha' med par ston par byed cing bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi yul la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will become skilled in the thus-gone ones’ treasury of Dharma and will reveal immeasurable and limitless Dharma illumination, and they will themselves attain liberation within the domain of the buddhas.

original: bkod pa mtha' yas /
analyzed: bkod pa mtha' yas /
translated: “Anantavyūha,

original: tshad med cing dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dvags yin zhe na /
analyzed: tshad med cing dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dvags yin zhe na /
translated: what is the meaning of ‘immeasurable’ and ‘infinite’?

original: bkod pa mtha' yas /
analyzed: bkod pa mtha' yas /
translated: Anantavyūha,

original: tshad med cing dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos thams cad tshad med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad med cing dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos thams cad tshad med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Immeasurable and infinite” means that all phenomena of the earth element, water element, fire element, wind element, space element, and consciousness element are immeasurable.

original: 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi khams tshad med pa yin yang /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi khams tshad med pa yin yang /
translated: Although the realms of sentient beings in the desire realm, form realm, and formless realm are immeasurable,

original: sems can yod pa ma yin pas sems can cung zad kyang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: sems can yod pa ma yin pas sems can cung zad kyang mi dmigs te /
translated: since sentient beings do not exist, not even a single sentient being is observed.

original: gdags su med do //
analyzed: gdags su med do //
translated: They cannot be designated.

original: de bzhin du khams yod pa ma yin pas khams mi dmigs te gdags su med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du khams yod pa ma yin pas khams mi dmigs te gdags su med do //
translated: Similarly, since the elements do not exist, the elements are not observed and cannot be designated.

original: de'i phyir chos de dag thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams su yang dag par 'du ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos de dag thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams su yang dag par 'du ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, all those phenomena are subsumed in the element of nirvāṇa.

original: chu'i khams @133b ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams kyi tshul can yin la /
analyzed: chu'i khams @133b ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams kyi tshul can yin la /
translated: The water element has the mode of the element of nirvāṇa.

original: chos thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul can te /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul can te /
translated: All phenomena also have the mode of nirvāṇa.

original: de'i phyir chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa'i rnam pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa'i rnam pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, all phenomena are inexpressible.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams la ni sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams la ni sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do //
translated: The realm of nirvāṇa is not obscured in the slightest way.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams ni sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir ma bsgribs pa yin no //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams ni sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir ma bsgribs pa yin no //
translated: The realm of nirvāṇa is unobscured because it is purified of obscurations.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams ni dag cing rnam par dag pa yin te /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams ni dag cing rnam par dag pa yin te /
translated: The realm of nirvāṇa is pure and completely pure.

original: 'di ltar chu'i khams de ni khams dang bral ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar chu'i khams de ni khams dang bral ba yin no //
translated: In this way, the water element is free from elements.

original: khams yod pa ma yin pas khams de khams las yang dag par bstan pas brjod pa yin no //🔽brjod pa gang yin pa de ni khams kyang ma yin //
analyzed: khams yod pa ma yin pas khams de khams las yang dag par bstan pas brjod pa yin no // brjod pa gang yin pa de ni khams kyang ma yin //
translated: Since the element does not exist, that element is described as being beyond elements.

original: khams ma yin pas kun nas bslang ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: khams ma yin pas kun nas bslang ba yang ma yin te /
translated: That which is described is neither an element nor is it something that is completely aroused.

original: brjod pa la ni khams yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod pa la ni khams yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Elements do not exist in descriptions.

original: chos thams cad ni tha snyad kyi sgo nas brjod pas de'i phyir 'di brjod du med pa yin te /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni tha snyad kyi sgo nas brjod pas de'i phyir 'di brjod du med pa yin te /
translated: All phenomena are described through conventions. Therefore, they are inexpressible.

original: 'di ltar 'di dag la ni rjod par byed pa yang mi dmigs shing mi mngon no //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di dag la ni rjod par byed pa yang mi dmigs shing mi mngon no //
translated: In this way, the one who expresses and the one who is expressed are not observed or apparent.

original: brjod pa thams cad ni brjod pa med pa yin te; 'di ltar brjod pa thams cad ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid yin cing /
analyzed: brjod pa thams cad ni brjod pa med pa yin te; 'di ltar brjod pa thams cad ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid yin cing /
translated: All expressions are inexpressible, because all expressions are of the nature of space,

original: nam mkhar yang dag par 'du ba yin no //
analyzed: nam mkhar yang dag par 'du ba yin no //
translated: and are subsumed in space.

original: sa'i khams kyang brjod du med cing brjod par nus pa ma yin la /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyang brjod du med cing brjod par nus pa ma yin la /
translated: The earth element is inexpressible and cannot be expressed.

original: chu'i khams kyang ma yin /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyang ma yin /
translated: It is not the water element,

original: me'i khams kyang ma yin /
analyzed: me'i khams kyang ma yin /
translated: it is not the fire element,

original: rlung gi khams kyang ma yin /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyang ma yin /
translated: it is not the wind element,

original: nam mkha'i khams kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyang ma yin te /
translated: and it is not the space element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi bar du yang brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi bar du yang brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Up to the space element cannot be expressed.

original: @134a *// rnam par shes pa'i khams gang gis chos thams cad tha snyad du ston pas ston par byed pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams de yang chu'i khams lta bu ste /
analyzed: @134a *// rnam par shes pa'i khams gang gis chos thams cad tha snyad du ston pas ston par byed pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams de yang chu'i khams lta bu ste /
translated: The element of consciousness that expresses all phenomena through conventional expressions is also like the water element.
